column4: im running jaunty... but after my FF update, my FF keeps on asking me to restart...how to prevent this??
and my bluetooth and wlan is on by default when i deliberately off them >.<
tried creating a new profile?
profile where?
run firefox like this:  firefox -P
im using default profile now
even with profile, it still ask me to restart FF
it says that my browser has been updated and requires a restart
so restart it
did... many times.. it just reappear again and again
ok, don't restart it, let it not start.  then, open a terminal and:  mv ~/.mozilla/firefox ~/.mozilla/firefox-old
try to run it again after that
same thing happens
o.O
that is weird
how how >.< when i disable bluetooth n wlan, they still auto startup when i restart
something in ubuntu is telling them to turn on anyway
what make/model laptop do you have?
check this: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=813764
dont haave a toggle off
solved the firefox prob by reinstalling it
